languages.text: "Ну так да. Годков тридцать назад привезли нас сюда с кучкой умников из высокого какого-то Адептуса. Так и живем здесь... у меня уже четвертый сын подрастает. Два на раскопках сгинули, одного чудища утащили, а младший еще жив..."

traits.locale_text: "Ну так да. Годков тридцать назад привезли нас сюда — кучку умников из высокого какого-то Адептуса и толпу сопроводителей в помощники. Так и живем здесь... у меня уже четвертый сын подрастает. Два на раскопках сгинули, а младшие еще живы..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."
languages.original_text: "Ну так да. Годков тридцать назад привезли нас сюда с кучкой умников из высокого какого-то Адептуса. Так и живем здесь... у меня уже четвертый сын подрастает. Два на раскопках сгинули, одного чудища утащили, а младший еще жив..."

traits.locale_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

traits.locale_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

traits.locale_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

traits.locale_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: “没错，大概是三十年前，我们被一群聪明人带到了这个地方。他们说他们是什么什么修会的人之类的。从那之后，我们就一直住在这里了……我有四个孩子，两个死在了挖掘场里，一个被怪物抓走了，但我最小的孩子还活着……”
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: “没错，大概是三十年前，我们被一群聪明人带到了这个地方。他们说他们是什么什么修会的人之类的。从那之后，我们就一直住在这里了……我有四个孩子，两个死在了挖掘场里，一个被怪物抓走了，但我最小的孩子还活着……”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: «Sí. Hace unos treinta años, nos enviaron aquí con un montón de genios de alto rango de algún Adeptus. Llevamos desde entonces viviendo aquí... he criado a cuatro hijos en este planeta. Dos murieron en las excavaciones y a otro se lo llevaron los monstruos, pero el más joven sigue vivo...».
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Hace unos treinta años, nos enviaron aquí con un montón de genios de alto rango de algún Adeptus. Llevamos desde entonces viviendo aquí... he criado a cuatro hijos en este planeta. Dos murieron en las excavaciones y a otro se lo llevaron los monstruos, pero el más joven sigue vivo...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: 「はい。30年ほど前、私たちは帝国のナントカという省庁の上の方から、たくさんの賢い人々とともにここに連れてこられました。それ以来、私たちはここに住んでいるのです…私はここで4人の子供を育てました。2人は発掘で亡くなりました。もう1人は魔物に殺されてしまいましたが、末っ子はまだ生きています…」
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: 「はい。30年ほど前、私たちは帝国のナントカという省庁の上の方から、たくさんの賢い人々とともにここに連れてこられました。それ以来、私たちはここに住んでいるのです…私はここで4人の子供を育てました。2人は発掘で亡くなりました。もう1人は魔物に殺されてしまいましたが、末っ子はまだ生きています…」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: « Oui. Il y a une trentaine d'années, on nous amenés ici avec une foule de gens intelligents issus d'un Adeptus dont j'ai oublié le nom et nous vivons ici depuis... J'ai élevé quatre enfants sur cette planète. Deux sont morts au cours des fouilles, un autre a été emporté par les monstres, mais mon plus jeune est encore en vie... »
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Il y a une trentaine d'années, on nous amenés ici avec une foule de gens intelligents issus d'un Adeptus dont j'ai oublié le nom et nous vivons ici depuis... J'ai élevé quatre enfants sur cette planète. Deux sont morts au cours des fouilles, un autre a été emporté par les monstres, mais mon plus jeune est encore en vie... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Ja. Vor ungefähr dreißig Jahren wurden wir zusammen mit einer Grupp kluger Menschen von irgendeinem wichtigen Adeptus hergebracht. Und seitdem leben wir hier ... Ich habe vier Kinder großgezogen. Zwei sind bei den Ausgrabungen gestorben, eins haben die Monster geholt, aber mein jüngstes lebt noch ..."
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Vor ungefähr dreißig Jahren wurden wir zusammen mit einer Grupp kluger Menschen von irgendeinem wichtigen Adeptus hergebracht. Und seitdem leben wir hier ... Ich habe vier Kinder großgezogen. Zwei sind bei den Ausgrabungen gestorben, eins haben die Monster geholt, aber mein jüngstes lebt noch ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Evet. Yaklaşık otuz yıl önce buraya yüksek rütbeli bir Adeptus'tan mı ne olan bir sürü kafası çalışan insanla birlikte getirildik. O gün bugündür de burada yaşıyoruz. Çocuklarımızı burada yetiştirdik. İkisi kazıda öldü, birisini canavarlar kaptı. Bir küçük olan hâlâ hayatta."
languages.original_text: "Yes. About thirty years back, we were brought here with a load of clever people from some high-up Adeptus of something or other. And we've lived here ever since... I've raised four kids here. Two died at the excavations, one was taken by the monsters, but my youngest is still alive..."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Yaklaşık otuz yıl önce buraya yüksek rütbeli bir Adeptus'tan mı ne olan bir sürü kafası çalışan insanla birlikte getirildik. O gün bugündür de burada yaşıyoruz. Çocuklarımızı burada yetiştirdik. İkisi kazıda öldü, birisini canavarlar kaptı ama küçük olan hâlâ hayatta."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF
